meanings.definition: Having more wrinkles than something else.
meanings.sent1: The old elephant was wrinklier than the young one.
meanings.sent2: Her grandmother's hands were wrinklier than her own.
meanings.sent3: The wrinklier the potato, the better the mashed potatoes!
meanings.sent4: The wrinklier the map, the more adventures it has seen.
meanings.sent5: The wrinklier the tree bark, the more stories it could tell.

meanings.sent1: This fabric is wrinklier than the one we used before.
meanings.sent2: The cat's fur looked wrinklier after it woke up from a nap.
meanings.sent3: The wrinklier the blanket, the cozier it feels.
meanings.sent4: His wrinklier expression showed his disappointment clearly.
meanings.sent5: The wrinklier the paper, the easier it tears.
